title: Distance Education Program for Nursing Care of Newborns with Congenital Heart Defects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic newborn nursing skills and foundational knowledge of cardiac physiology
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment conducted on a remote platform for in-service neonatal nurses. Strengthening practical competencies through digital device support and clinical case analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain physiological characteristics and risk factors of newborns with congenital heart defects with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design and implement personalized nursing interventions for heart defect types using PBL methodology
Learners can simulate newborn monitoring and emergency response procedures using digital content on remote education platforms
Learners can develop and receive evaluations for multidisciplinary collaborative nursing strategies through team-based projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
